title: List of Vanderbilt University people - Wikipedia
cleaned_text: List of Vanderbilt University people This is a list of notable current and former faculty members, alumni (graduating and non-graduating) of [Vanderbilt University](/wiki/Vanderbilt_University) in [Nashville, Tennessee](/wiki/Nashville,_Tennessee). Unless otherwise noted, attendees listed graduated with a [bachelor's degree](/wiki/Bachelor%27s_degree). Names with an asterisk (*) graduated from [Peabody College](/wiki/Peabody_College) prior to its merger with Vanderbilt.
